lines.text: Leo would put me back in the clink if I used unauthorized magic in front of him, but...
<c=#FF00FF>Lightningbolt Mind</c> doesn't need any words to activate- all I have to do is press <c=#FF00FF>A</c> or <c=#FF00FF>D!</c>
And the only thing it affects is my head, so Officer Fleini won't know anything's up!
This spell lets me speed up my thoughts, so that it seems like the whole outside world stands still.
Inside my own head, I can recall all evidence I've gathered, and remind myself what I have to work with.
